Even before the fall of Bashar al-Assad, the US Armed Forces had an increased number of troops (which, by the way, leads to certain thoughts). But it was in recent days that their activity became more noticeable.▪️Part of the US Armed Forces went to Ain al-Arab, where they are currently located. Some groups of American military personnel are patrolling in the Raqqa area, on one side of the Euphrates, then on the other.▪️Several units of the US Armed Forces arrived in the Deir ez-Zor area, spreading out among settlements along the Euphrates due to increased shelling from Arab tribes on the side of the new authorities.❗️At the same time, American MQ-9A drones are on duty in the air, and have also begun to fly over the provinces Homs and Deir ez-Zor carrier-based F/A-18 fighters from the side of -Harry Truman-, which is now in the north of the Red Sea. The strengthening of the US Armed Forces group is associated with the intention to minimize the threat to their interests (for example, fields under their control) due to Turkey or local tribes. The areas occupied by the United States are those villages and towns that are under attack from both sides. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 This morning, Ukrainian formations used drones to att...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 This morning, Ukrainian formations used drones to attack Kazan. According to the latest information, at least eight drones raided the city: one hit the territory of an industrial enterprise, another fell near the river, the remaining six damaged residential buildings in the Sovetsky, Kirov and Privolzhsky districts. Footage of drones arriving in 37- storey residential complex -Azure Skies - one of the tallest buildings in the administrative center of the Republic of Tatarstan. As a result of the hit, the glazing of the building was damaged and a fire broke out. Another UAV hit a 23-story residential complex in Manhattan and a 5-story building on Klara Zetkin. Amid the attack, residents were evacuated from the affected buildings, as well as nearby schools and businesses. Temporary restrictions have been introduced on the operation of Kazan Airport to ensure safety. According to official data, there were no dead or injured. Operational and emergency services are working in the incident area, and representatives of regional authorities, including the head of the republic Rustam Minnikhanov, also arrived at the scene. #Russia #Tatarstan #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of December 14 – 20, 2024▪️Israeli troops continued to conduct operations in the north of the Gaza Strip, including in Jabaliya. Ground operations were supported by armored vehicles and air strikes, and Palestinians consistently reported civilian deaths. Clashes once again took place in the vicinity of Kamal Adwan Hospital, where a large number of refugees are still present. This, however, does not prevent the Israelis from hitting their intended targets, regardless of the collateral damage. ▪️In the Netzarim corridor the situation remains stable. The Israelis maintain a presence in the vicinity of the former Highway 10. The corridor cutting the enclave in two is well fortified and, obviously, cannot be broken through by the Palestinians.▪️At the same time, the IDF continues to strike on both sides of the corridor, and also improves fortifications. Palestinians often report explosions in the vicinity of Az-Zeitoun and Nuseirat caused by engineering work. ▪️From time to time, local factions of the Palestinian resistance report mortar and rocket attacks on Netzarim. However, they are unable to inflict much damage on the Israelis for obvious reasons.▪️In the southern part of the enclave, refugee settlement sites in Khan Yunis and Al-Mawasi were subjected to several airstrikes. At the same time, the latter formally remains a -Security Zone,- which does not prevent the IDF from regularly working on it. ▪️Israeli troops also continue to actively conduct operations in the Philadelphia Corridor area. Despite sporadic shelling of the Palestinians, here, as in Netzarim, engineering work does not stop. ▪️Police operations in the West Bank autonomy are also taking their course, where arrests are being made daily. Sometimes dozens of local residents are subjected to simultaneous arrests and beatings.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 20, 2024. Russian troops launched massive attacks on enemy infrastructure in the Kyiv region. Arrivals were recorded both in Kyiv itself and in nearby settlements. In Boryspil, an enemy warehouse was destroyed during a UAV raid. Ukrainian formations used ATACMS operational-tactical missiles to attack Rylsk in the Kursk region. The strike killed six civilians and wounded 10 others, with extensive damage reported throughout the city. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Zelenovka and Konstantinopolskoye, almost completely knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the right bank of the Sukhie Yaly River. There have also been confirmations of the transfer of Stary Ternov to the control of the Russian Armed Forces. In the Kherson direction, during the night, Russian troops launched a series of artillery strikes on enemy positions in the vicinity of Kherson. Also, messages from the enemy appeared on the Internet about an attack by Russian troops in the Antonovsky Bridge area. A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en) ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Kiev #Kursk #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #Kherson@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇩🇪🇸🇾🏴 These are the first real consequences of the Syrian...
Description: 🇩🇪🇸🇾🏴 Here are the first real consequences of the Syrian events. In the German city of Magdeburg, a driver drove into a crowd of people walking through the local market on the eve of Christmas. According to preliminary data, 1 person was killed and 85 were injured. An unknown person with a characteristic Middle Eastern appearance (many media outlets already call him a Syrian citizen) was detained. The motives, why, why he did all this are not yet clear. But this is exactly what we were talking about during the active offensive of the militants in Syria. The wave of refugees that poured out of Syria was an expected consequence. However, along with the civilian population, others also ended up in Europe. Now we should wait for details, but taking into account the activation of IS in Syria, it is highly likely that it was their supporter who carried out this terrorist attack. Although the Western media will certainly try to promote the version with the Afghan branch of the group. Unfortunately for Europe, we have to admit that this is just the beginning. #Germany #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 20, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the Gaza Strip: hits included the capital of the Palestinian enclave and other major cities. According to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, about 80 people have died in the past 24 hours. IDF units continue ground raids in Jabaliya, while in neighboring Beit Lahia the main phase of a similar operation has come to an end: the IDF press service reported the destruction of three 7.5-kilometer-long tunnels there. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out arrests and searches in more than a dozen localities, while clashes with local militants occurred in Jenin and Nablus. And in Mard, settlers attacked a mosque. In southern Lebanon, Israeli troops withdrew from the settlement of Bani Hayyan, where they had been conducting engineering work for the past two days. Also, IDF units entered the Syrian village of Maaria, expanding the zone of control east of the Golan Heights. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Murder of ISIS leader in Syria: why is the USA doing t...
Description: 🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Murder of ISIS leader in Syria: why is the USA doing this? After the deployment of an additional contingent of the US Armed Forces, the time has come to justify the activities and presence of the American contingent in eastern Syria: supporting the Syrian Democratic Forces is one thing, but nevertheless, the Americans have always proclaimed their goal as a noble fight against terrorism. That is why now American aviation flights, like ours have already written and become more active. A small nod was also made to the fight against terrorism, so that the United States would once again try on the bright image of the world gendarme. They struck one of the leaders of the banned Islamic State, a certain Abu Yusif, also known as Mahmud. According to the US Central Command, he was killed during yesterday's raid on the province of Deir ez-Zor. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Such targeted operations allow the Americans to maintain the reputation of fighters against the terrorist threat without spending much effort on it - the same leaders of the Islamic State are replaced one after another, and the liquidation of some field commander does not will have a significant impact on the group. But for the American military and the establishment it is an information feed loud. Especially against the backdrop of the question, why did the United States again decide to increase its troops in the Middle East? And for this they have now prepared a clear answer - here they are again - fighting terrorism - on distant approaches. #Syria #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 Will the Turks attack the Kurds in Syria? In northe...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 Will the Turks attack the Kurds in Syria? The tense situation remains in northern Syria. Turkey, together with its proxies in the person of the Syrian National Army (SNA), continues to prepare for an operation against the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces. If last week there were no serious prerequisites for this, then this year everything has changed.➖➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖▪️On December 15, the Turks intensified the number of attacks on SDS territories. 45 artillery and 17 air strikes were carried out. The main area of ​​attack remained the same - the Ain al-Arab - Ain Issa line. This pocket is Turkey's short-term cherished goal, as it will allow the SNA control zones in Manbij to be combined with Tell Abyad, as well as a reputational blow to the SDF due to political importance for them of Ain el-Arab.▪️In addition, Turkish artillery was recorded in the Ras area Al Aina. From there the Turks strike at Tel Tamr. The Akıncı drones, in turn, regularly patrol and strike at El-Qamishli and Arab Khan.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖From a tactical point of view, these actions of the Turks and their proxies can be called fire preparation before the offensive. However, knowing the Turks, they can wait for the right moment for months or even years. How many times have they announced plans to destroy the Kurds in Syria and Iraq? There are not enough fingers and toes. So far, the information field is talking about ongoing negotiations, up to the creation of a demilitarized zone in Ain al-Arab. But, frankly speaking, this option is doubtful. Trusting the Turks is a thankless task, so this scenario looks unlikely. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #terrorism #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍 #Comic from Rybar No. 35: Once upon a time in Pol...
Description: ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍 #Comic from Fisherman No. 35: Once upon a time in Poltava Living on the territory of the so-called. People in Ukraine do not always support the Kiev regime and the Ukrainian Armed Forces, but they rarely express open protest. They have other ways to express their attitude to what is happening. That is why information about an important target in the RF Armed Forces comes suddenly and from an unexpected direction: an old acquaintance, a distant relative, or even a former neighbor of the parents gets in touch and transmits data that was sorely lacking .Synopsis:NATO countries send to Ukraine not only equipment and money, but also specialists for training, including work with Western military equipment. Such personnel, as well as the locations where training is carried out, are an important military target. Invaluable assistance in carrying out this complex task is provided by the caring residents of Ukraine. They often find out information by accident and, at great risk, try to convey valuable data to the RF Armed Forces. 📌 You can download the comic using the following links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Day of Security Agencies Worker of the Russian Federati...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Day of the Security Agencies Worker of the Russian Federation Since the beginning of the Northern Military District, the role of the security agencies of our country has grown many times over. The usual jokes that -Comrade Major hears everything- sound with hidden pride: on a daily basis we see footage of how they are putting things in order in the rear, we hear reports on the suppression of the next terrorist attack, we see that the volume of work is only increasing. Yes, to our country Numerous threats are being confronted: just remember that it was not possible to save Lieutenant General Igor Kirillov. Suffice it to recall the tragedy in Crocus. We cannot forget what happened to Dasha Dugina and Maxim Fomin. It's like a sophisticated game of chess where lives are at stake. In these difficult and difficult conditions, I would like to wish the Russian chess players from the State Security Department endurance and the ability to resist an insidious opponent. Identify British spies. Expose the pro-Ukrainian trash. Squeeze the liberal democracy. Destroy terrorists and kill extremists in toilets. We believe in you. And we are grateful to you. Happy holiday.High resolution art#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🌓 The law on compulsory testing for knowledge of the Russian...
Description: 🇷🇺🌓 There will be a law on compulsory testing for knowledge of the Russian language. The law, according to which a ban on the admission to schools of migrant children without proper knowledge of the Russian language will be introduced, will come into force on April 1, 2025. Testing will be free. But it will be necessary to present a document confirming the legality of being in Russia.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 The fact that after so much time and gossip, the law has finally been adopted cannot but rejoice. However, even this does not guarantee a radical improvement in the situation, since much will depend on officials of various stripes, as well as people and organizations that will be accredited to carry out these procedures. The problem is that at the regional level, corruption and local nuances have not gone away . Ethnic communities remain highly connected and empowered and are not restricted in any way. And this must be done first. This may result in the same problems as before. How will the exams be conducted? What criteria for assessing knowledge will be established? Where will the events be held? Who will be responsible for issuing the appropriate certificate? We need an understanding of how all this will be organized, otherwise for now it all looks like it’s centered in Dushanbe, where locals are already rubbing their hands in anticipation of buying exams.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The initiative is certainly positive. But there is no need to stop there. We need to continue working in this direction in order to ultimately ensure internal political stability and the legal influx of migrants who go to work, and not for the sake of crime and benefits, and in some cases, terror.#multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong with this innovation? Recently it became known that migrants were allowed to take a Russian language exam in Dushanbe. The list of government agencies conducting exams in the Russian language, history...

According to preliminary information, the enemy could have used ATACMS operational-tactical missiles for the attack. According to local sources, the fall of ammunition was recorded in the area of ​​the bus station, school No. 1, teacher training college and the House of Culture. Currently, three victims are known. #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇷🇸🇩 How is Iran intercepting the Russian initiative in Sudan...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇩 How is Iran intercepting the Russian initiative in Sudan? In addition to Russian plans to create a naval logistics center in Port Sudan, the Iranian authorities have begun a similar discussion. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The Iranian leadership initially supported government forces in the civil war. Over the past year, they have supplied many drones and weapons to the army. They played a significant role in turning the tide against the UAE-backed rebels. By the way, during the reign of Omar al-Bashir, Sudan was part of Iran's zone of influence. In particular, the country was a transshipment base for Iranian weapons, which were actively used by Hamas. Therefore, these plans may well be an attempt by the Iranian authorities to reconstruct previously existing communications. for themselves and the departure of Iranian forces from Syria, their influence in the region the Iranians may well focus on Sudan. Moreover, this will clearly not be prevented by the local authorities, who are winning thanks to help from Tehran. Against this background, the hesitations of the Russian responsible structures regarding the creation of their own logistics center for the Navy in Port Sudan seem strange. While economic projects are developing, an important logistics hub is leaving our hands.#Africa #Iran #Sudan #Russia@rybarSupport usBloomberg.comRussian Guns, Iranian Drones Are Fueling Sudan’s Brutal Civil WarInside Russia and Iran’s efforts to help Sudan’s army win a civil brutal war

Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Is Georgia afraid of European sanctions? Or not? Secreta...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Is Georgia afraid of European sanctions? Or not? Secretary General of the Council of Europe Alain Berset said at a press conference in Tbilisi that the Georgian authorities promised to amend the law on -foreign agents-, because of which mass riots swept across the country. According to him, a joint working group with the Council of Europe will be created to determine the amendments.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖We don’t know what the pro-Western Georgian channels were so happy about. There is an old saying - promising does not mean marrying. The Georgian authorities said that they would consider this option, think about it and maybe come up with something. Or maybe not. What the Secretary General of the Council of Europe said does not have any clear form, there is no specificity and no legal obligation. Why should the Georgian ruling party make concessions if they can cope without all this? On the contrary, they became confident in their abilities. The protests and riots led to nothing, the economy is on the rise, and sanctions from European countries will not have a negative impact. What at first glance looks like a concession on the part of the Georgian authorities is in fact more of a carrot, but for the EU.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇹🇷🇺🇿 -Tentacles-OTG in Central Asia - the role of Azerbai...
Description: 🇦🇿🇹🇷🇺🇿 -Tentacles- OTG in Central Asia - the role of Azerbaijan in Turkey’s plans The delegation of the Ministry of Defense of Uzbekistan visited the department of the Ministry of Defense of Azerbaijan as part of its visit. This is not the first such exchange of experience, especially in 2024 - the number of military exercises and defense meetings in the Organization of Turkic States has increased significantly. Neighboring Kazakhstan signed an agreement on military intelligence with Baku, and joint tactical exercises of Kazakh and Azerbaijani units took place. Uzbekistan has not lagged behind Astana before, and Kyrgyzstan, together with Tajikistan, took part in the Birlestik 2024 exercises. And we are not talking about Turkey’s bayraktar diplomacy in the region. Azerbaijan acts as a kind of conductor between Central Asia and Turkey. This is especially facilitated by the image in the media, promoted for the region, that Baku is an example of a post-Soviet army that has undergone successful modernization and won on the battlefield - a traditional enemy for the Turkic world.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Military cooperation between members of the UTG is gradually increasing momentum. Various councils are appearing in the armed forces, security agencies, and further, judging by the pace, cooperation will deepen. The Turks are striking while the iron is hot, seeing the inertia of another bloc in the region – the CSTO. Exercises, the number of which can be counted on the fingers of one hand in one year, are not enough for an organization that acts as a guarantor of security for the region, even though Uzbekistan is not a member of the CSTO. While we are dormant, the pan-Turkist bloc is spreading its tentacles in Central Asia. #Azerbaijan #OTG #CentralAsia #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport uscaliber.az A working meeting of military specialists from Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan took place | Caliber.AzIn accordance with the bilateral cooperation plan for 2024, signed by the Ministries of Defense of Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan, at the training center of the Azerbaijani...

Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 In South Korea, they fear escalation due to the actions ...
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 In South Korea, they fear escalation due to the actions of activists. In Seoul, they continue to talk about the activities of activists who, since the spring of 2024, have been provoking the DPRK with propaganda leaflets and receiving thousands of garbage balloons in response. It recently became known that the South Korean Ministry of Unification has asked public groups to refrain from sending leaflets. However, the ministry did not receive a specific response from organizations. It is unknown whether activists with strong anti-North Korean views will listen to the government's recommendations. After all, their activities, from the point of view of South Korean law, are not illegal. 📌An interesting point is that before this, the Ministry of Unification took a different position. ▪️Even after numerous launches of garbage balloons and associated financial damage, the department emphasized that South Korean activists have the right to freedom of expression. This means that no one can prohibit them from doing anything. ▪️Now, against the backdrop of the unstable political situation in South Korea itself, the government recommends stopping propaganda activities, as they do not want to worsen the situation on the Korean Peninsula. After all, the DPRK can take advantage of propaganda campaigns and react to them with varying degrees of severity. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖By the way, it’s not a fact that the recommendations will work in the long term. In the event, for example, that new elections are called and the ruling conservative party wins, the government will most likely continue to turn a blind eye to such activities. #DPRK #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us 자제’ 요청-통일부가 지난 12일 대북전단 관련 7개 단체에 ‘살포 자제’를 요청했다고 밝혔다. '정세 관리' 보인다…

Title: 🎬🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Combined strike on the territory of the so-called. ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Combined strike on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine - where were the Russian Armed Forces aiming? Russian troops carried out a combined attack at night on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. Previously, hypersonic missiles and drones were launched at targets in several regions. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️Arrivals were recorded in Kyiv, where several large fires broke out, including in the Goloseevsky and Solomensky districts. There, buildings and gas pipes were damaged and cars burned out on the streets en masse. On the Internet, some Ukrainian citizens claim that fires in the streets are the result of the work of Patriot anti-aircraft missile systems covering the city. However, one can only guess about the specific targets that came under attack. For example, in the Solomensky district there is the Zhulyany airfield and the Antonov plant. Military-industrial complex enterprises such as Kommash are located in Goloseevsky. Both Zhulyany and Antonov are used by the Ukrainian Armed Forces for military purposes.▪️In the Kyiv region, a warehouse with an area of ​​15,000 m² in Boryspil is on fire as a result of a drone strike. Judging by the photographs, this building belongs to the company Costal Ukraine, which produces parts for equipment. Information is also being received about the defeat of the Ukrainian Armed Forces airfield near the city of Vasylkiv. This military base was used to house a tactical aviation brigade before the North Military District, and in recent years it has been modernized to accommodate F-16 fighters.▪️In the south of the country, numerous explosions were heard in Kherson, and there are power outages there. In the Ukrainian segment of the Internet, reports have appeared that the ongoing attack is a cover for the start of an assault by Russian troops on enemy positions in the Antonovsky Bridge area. In addition, in Poltava, Sumy, Dnepropetrovsk and other regions, arrivals at energy infrastructure facilities were noted. #Kiev #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ☪️🇷🇺🇬🇧 Our colleagues from the Telegram channel - The Devil W...
Description: ☪️🇷🇺🇬🇧 Our colleagues from the Telegram channel - The Devil Walks in Dixie - @dixi_devil, who closely follow the sectarian and religious-anti-state agenda, saw in today’s prank of the leadership of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims a challenge and an attempt to try on the functions of a government agency. We are inclined to agree with this statement, and not only because of the ones used by the Mufti of Moscow the wording or choice of date for such a statement. Not long ago, we published a detailed investigation on the controversial reputation of the Spiritual Movement of Muslims, its flirtations with radical Islam, as well as with foreign intelligence services. In particular, the assistant to the Russian mufti - who is also the head of the science department in the Department of Science and Education of the Muslim Spiritual Directorate - Ilyas Sadulin was in contact with the British diplomat Blake Patel, who had lost his accreditation for espionage, who specialized in working with Russian Muslims. Separately striking is the actual defense of illegal migration, radicals and other -delights- from the religious paraphernalia of the latter. Against this background, the demonstrative permission of polygamy no longer looks simple - an explanation of the rights in a religious marriage -, but is quite worthy of the attention of the relevant structures. Muslim Directorate was once again featured in the news agenda. Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of December 13 - 19, 2024▪️The Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - again tried to attack Israeli territory. The ballistic missile was intercepted over Ramat Gan, and several buildings were damaged by falling fragments.▪️In response, the Israel Defense Forces launched concentrated strikes on Yemeni territory. The port of Al-Hodeidah and energy infrastructure facilities in the area of ​​Sanaa and Aden were hit, and fires broke out.▪️Israeli aviation also again carried out a massive raid on army facilities in Syria. Most of the attacks occurred in the province of Tartus, where the target was the remaining air defense positions, warehouses with weapons and fuels and lubricants. Explosions also occurred in the province of Deir ez-Zor, where the bridge over the Euphrates River was attacked for the second time in a week. The positions where Shiite groups and IRGC personnel were previously stationed were under fire.▪️To the east of the Golan Heights, the Israel Defense Forces advanced deep into the Daraa province almost without a fight. Thus, Israeli units occupied the village of Saida on the administrative border with the province of Quneitra.▪️In the province of Rif Damascus south of Mount Hermon, the Israelis did not achieve significant success. Residents of Beit Jinnah refused to surrender their weapons and forced the IDF to retreat from the surrounding heights.▪️The rest of Syria remained in a state of instability due to the resulting power vacuum. Jihadists destroyed cultural and religious symbols, in particular churches and Shiite shrines.▪️Field executions of representatives of the former regime accused of crimes, including officers, continued. However, often the real motive for the murders was belonging to religious minorities, in particular Alawites.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 19, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israelis continue operations in Jabaliya and Beit Lahia, as well as in the vicinity of the Kamal Adwan hospital. As a result of an Israeli Air Force airstrike on a house in Jabaliya, 13 people were killed. In the center of the enclave, the Israeli Air Force struck Al-Maghazi, the outskirts of Nuseirat and Deir al-Balah, and the situation remained calm, with the exception of explosions in the vicinity of the Philadelphia Corridor and artillery IDF strikes in the Khuzaa area. Clashes occurred in the West Bank in Nablus and nearby refugee camps, and four members of Kataib Shuhada al-Aqsa were killed in Tulkarm. In the Balata camp, an 80-year-old woman died during an Israeli operation. Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of attacks on ports and power plants in Yemen, killing at least nine people. In turn, the Ansarallah movement launched another missile at Tel Aviv, hitting a school in Ramat Gan.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish versionOnline maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇹🇯🇺🇿🏴 Another remarkable news from Central Asia: it turn...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇯🇺🇿🏴 Another remarkable news from Central Asia: it turns out that countries in the region are world leaders in repatriating their citizens from camps in Syria where Islamic State militants and their families are being held. According to the Global Fund for Building Community Resilience ( GCERF), in total the Central Asian states returned home about 2,220 such citizens. Kazakhstan accounts for 754 people, Uzbekistan - 531, Tajikistan - 381, and Kyrgyzstan 533. The head of GCERF even sets them as an example for others, saying that while Western Europe is in no hurry to take citizens from the camps of IS supporters, in Central Asia they do this without problems. True, he notes that some of the repatriated women and children eventually returned to Syria.❗️Now let’s remember where exactly migrants from Tajikistan or Uzbekistan most often go. And also the current state of control of migration flows from the region, where strict filtering measures are just beginning to be implemented. So a completely reasonable question arises: how many of these -repatriated- natives from Central Asia from among the relatives of IS militants took advantage of the situation and penetrated into the more northern and a larger country? #Syria #Tajikistan #Uzbekistan #terrorism@rybarSupport usSputnik TajikistanTajikistan has returned almost 400 of its citizens from SyriaCentral Asian governments are world leaders in repatriating their citizens from camps in Syria, the head of GCERF said

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇸🇾 Meanwhile, Russian troops continue to leave northeast...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾 Meanwhile, Russian troops continue to leave the northeast of Syria in the province of Hasakah, controlled by the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF). The largest stronghold of the Russian Armed Forces in this region was the airfield near the city of Qamishli, which in 2011-2024 was actually an enclave of Syrian government forces surrounded by the SDF. In the period between In 2017-2020, Russian air defense systems, radars, and Ka-52 attack helicopters were deployed at the facility, among others. And in 2021, Su-35S fighters were even based there for some time. The footage shows some of the equipment being transported on Il-76 cargo planes. Apparently, even with all the workload in the Northern Military District zone, military transport aviation is still coping with the task of transporting personnel and material and technical means to Russia from Syria. #Russia #Syria #Hasakah@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇩 After failures in politics, the Moldovan authorities remembe...
Description: 🇲🇩 After failures in politics, the Moldovan authorities remembered the Russian language. President of Moldova Maia Sandu said that her team made many mistakes, including the lack of due attention to conducting dialogue with the population in Russian. This applies not only to Gagauzia with a predominantly Russian-speaking population, but also to the republic as a whole.▪️Such admissions of mistakes from Sandu do not look sincere - such statements are made exclusively before the parliamentary elections that will be held in Moldova in 2025. ▪️Sandu’s failure in the presidential elections within the country, where the majority of the republic’s residents voted against her in the second round, suggests that her party Action and Solidarity (PAS) may face much more serious problems. Moreover, in the local elections in In November 2023, the ruling PAS party did not achieve success, despite the use of administrative resources and repression against the opposition. ▪️Finally, Sandu’s tense relationship with Gagauzia is a diagnosis. Since his first term, the President has ignored the local bashkans, seeing them as a threat to -Romanian- Moldova from his fantasies. Many times the politician and her entourage criticized the Gagauz people for using the Russian language. 🔻For Sandu, who in fact never admits her mistakes, the current confessions are an obvious preparation for the elections and an attempt to do at least something to win back the electorate. Even the promises of the second round of government reshuffles were actually ignored, which means that the president is actually satisfied with everything. #Gagauzia #Moldova @rybarSupport usRIA Novosti Sandu: the authorities did not pay enough attention to Russian-speaking citizens The Moldovan authorities did not pay attention to conducting a dialogue with Russian-speaking residents, said the President of the Republic Maia Maia Sandu. RIA Novosti, 12/19/2024

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇾🇪 Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a ser...
Description: 🇮🇱🇾🇪 Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of strikes on various targets in Yemen in response to recent missile and drone launches on Israeli territory. As a result of IDF strikes, according to preliminary data, at least nine people were killed: seven during arrivals at the port of Es Salif, and two during an attack on an oil facility in the Ras Issa area. In addition, two power plants in Sana'a were also attacked. It is curious that Israeli planes missed a ballistic missile launched that same night from Yemen. An explosion occurred in the city of Ramat Gan, where one of the schools was destroyed. According to some sources, this was a consequence of the arrival of Yemeni ammunition, according to others - the result of a hit by an Israeli interceptor missile. Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Gas transit through the Ukrainian GTS: topic closed It s...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Gas transit through the Ukrainian GTS: topic closed It seems that the topic of gas transit to Europe through the so-called Ukraine, which has long worried the minds of the patriotic public, is finally closed: Vladimir Putin said that there will definitely not be a new supply contract. According to the Russian president, Gazprom will survive this situation. He also reported on the detention of Ukrainian saboteurs in Slovakia with maps of local gas energy facilities for subsequent detonation.📌 In this case, let us repeat the words spoken in the summer: Russian gas pumped to the EU gave (and still gives) income, which goes towards maintaining economic stability under sanctions , as well as the production of tanks, salaries for military personnel and other military expenses. The main initiator of the cessation of supplies through the Ukrainian gas transportation system was the United States and the Kiev regime with the aim of cut off Hungary and Slovakia from Russian gas. The so-called authorities Ukraine has repeatedly reported that it will not renew the five-year contract from 2019 after its expiration.❗️In the current situation, Russia, apparently, will focus on increasing LNG supplies by sea to compensate for lost revenues - again, let us remind you that in the current conditions, maintaining energy exports is not an option, but a vital necessity. Well, the so-called. Ukraine has actually shot itself in the foot again by depriving it of transit revenues and not receiving any of its own benefits from it. The approach favored by the Ukrainian elite - neither for themselves nor for the people - will lead to natural economic consequences for the local population. #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Prospects for an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Black Sea - more likely than not Colleagues Two Majors discuss the possible direction of the attack of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Black Sea on the Crimean Peninsula, noting that while everyone is preparing for a breakthrough in the north, Ukrainian formations may - unexpectedly - strike in the south. Title: 🇷🇺 New regions - what has been done and remains to be done One ...
Description: 🇷🇺 New regions - what has been done and remains to be done One of the topics of Vladimir Putin’s direct line was the issue of infrastructure in new regions: according to him, Russia has enough strength and means to restore its historical territories. ▪️The President announced a figure of more than 21 thousand restored objects in Donbass and Novorossiya. A large-scale plan for the development of new regions has been drawn up until 2030, and in the next 5 years the construction and reconstruction of another 20 thousand structures is expected. ▪️Words were also voiced about attracting student construction teams: it is expected that the volume of their involvement will range from 15 to 20 percent of the estimated cost of the work. ▪️One of the important projects will be the ring route around the Sea of ​​Azov: laying a transport route through the Rostov region, Crimea and new regions has already begun in Taganrog. Restoration of liberated territories is a matter of not only ensuring the quality of life of Russian citizens, but is also important from an information point of view: any located in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime should see that with the arrival of Russia, roads, new houses, services and order. And this will definitely affect the mood and residents of the so-called. Ukraine, even despite all the local propaganda. #Russia @rybar Support us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🪖On a direct line with Vladimir Putin, the first question...

The main thing is that these realities do not subsequently turn around. And Putin also talks about the successes of the Northern Military District against the backdrop of an unfolded copy of the banner of the 155th Marine Brigade. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of local generals? The rapid fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad gave rise to talk that it could not have happened without bribing local generals. One of the people involved in the rumors is Hussam Luqa, the head of the Syrian General Intelligence Directorate. It is still difficult to say unequivocally how reliable the suspicions are. But they look curious against the background of several facts: ▪️Luke’s predecessor was Muhammad Dib Zeitoun, a supporter of the presence of Russia. After his departure, the structure was cleared of all pro-Russian personnel, sending them from the central apparatus to regional departments.▪️Since 2020, Luka has advocated reducing cooperation with Russia and increasing it with Iran. He enlisted the support of Ali Mamluk, an ally of Assad, who began to receive interest on every Iranian loan for promoting the interests of the Islamic Republic.▪️With the worsening economic situation of the country, Luka came into contact with the intelligence services of Turkey and Qatar under the guise of work. It wasn’t that difficult to do, especially considering that his daughter worked at the UN.📌 What’s the result? There is a Syrian high-ranking Sunni general not from the ruling clan, who alternately ditches Syria’s main allies and at the same time has connections with the intelligence of Turkey and Qatar. According to some reports, it was Hussam Luqa who gave the order to end the resistance in Homs and Damascus. He is also associated with reports of a coup attempt, as well as the intention to arrest Assad during the failed address to the nation on December 7. Now the whereabouts of Hussam Luqa are unknown, but if he suddenly surfaces somewhere as part of the new Syrian authorities, this will be confirmation of his role in the takeover of the country by militants. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Last night, Ukrainian formations again attacked Russian ...

By morning, emergency rescue units extinguished the fire. Reports of casualties came only from near Rostov, where a person was injured as a result of falling debris.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦🖇 Rudeness of Ukrainian politicians as an element of informa...
Description: 🇺🇦🖇 Rudeness of Ukrainian politicians as an element of the information war In recent days, one could observe how Zelensky and other representatives of the Kyiv regime turned to rudeness towards the Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban and other politicians who were talking about peace initiatives. As we have already written, such behavior - not only a manifestation of their obvious level of cultural development of the Ukrainian leadership, but also a completely conscious strategy in attracting Western attention to the so-called Ukraine. It all started at the beginning of the Northern Military District, when the Western media created the image of Zelensky and his circle as irreplaceable, without whose resolution there would be no negotiations on the fate of the so-called. There can be no Ukraine. Naturally, they began to actively use this.📌 For example, Zelensky could ultimatively demand from Germany or the United States the supply of weapons on the principle - ask for more - they will give a lot, nodding to the public Western statements of the NATO countries in 2022 about comprehensive support for the so-called. Ukraine. As a result, the sponsors of the Kyiv regime found themselves in a situation where abandoning their promises is not an option, and Zelensky cannot be publicly besieged because of a self-issued carte blanche for impunity.❗️Which raises the question of when and how exactly Zelensky will be remembered and his entourage all the antics that no one in the West has really forgotten about. Especially in conditions when the costs of maintaining the so-called. Ukraine is becoming less and less in line with its emissions. #mediatechnology #Ukraine@rybarSupport usRIA NovostiZelensky was rude to Orban after his words about peace negotiationsVladimir Zelensky said that he would not allow Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban to mediate in negotiations to resolve the conflict with Russia... RIA Novosti, 12/17/2024

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): attempts to reac...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): attempts to reach agreements on Ain al-Arabsituation by 9:00 December 19, 2024 Expected Turkish military operation to capture the city of Ain al-Arab and its countryside in the northeast of Aleppo province for now hasn't started. ▪️Instead, the Turkish Armed Forces have so far only periodically struck at the positions of the Arab-Kurdish association - the Syrian Democratic Forces - (SDF). At the same time, Turkish troops are bringing reinforcements to the line of combat contact.▪️At the demilitarized Tishrin dam, located east of the city of Menbij, there were clashes between factions of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army (SNA) and fighters of the pro-Kurdish Menbij Military Council.❗On this Against the backdrop, there were reports that the Americans managed to delay the start of the battle for Ain al-Arab until the end current week. During this time, the parties must reach a truce. The Kurds have already expressed their readiness for this.▪️So, the commander of the Syrian Democratic Forces, Mazlum Abdi, proposed declaring Ain al-Arab and the surrounding areas in the countryside a demilitarized zone. This should allay Turkey's concerns about the presence of Kurdish forces near its border. In the event of the withdrawal of SDF units from the city, all responsibility should fall on the American contingent. Another question is that such a number of US military personnel is unlikely to be able to prevent an attack by Turkey and its local allies.🔻As we wrote, Ain el-Arab (or Kobani, as the Kurds call it) will defend the SDF more actively: for them it is a symbol of resilience against the face of terrorism, where they include the Turkish-backed SNA. The majority of the city's population is also Kurdish. However, in reality everything may turn out differently. Ain el-Arab may well repeat the fate of Afrin, when the Kurdish units there promised to fight to the end for the city, but were forced to leave it under the threat of bombing by Turkish aircraft.
